Enhance Your YouTube Experience with Video Clipper

Video Clipper is a Chrome extension that allows you to seamlessly create, organize, and play clips from your favourite YouTube videos. Whether you're a dancer, musician, student, or just want to save memorable moments, Video Looper makes it easy to extract and curate the content you love directly within YouTube. Support for more platforms is coming soon!

Key Features

- Simple Clip Creation: Select and save specific video segments with just a few clicks or shortcuts.
- Full-Screen Playback: Enjoy your clips in full-screen mode while retaining the original video's context.
- Search Capability: List all your clips and search through them easily in a dedicated UI.

Upcoming Features

- Organized Library: Sort your clips into folders and playlists for easy access.
- Customizable Settings: Modify playback speed, loop settings, and more to match your preferences.

Ideal for

- Dancers: Practice and perfect your moves with customized clips.
- Musicians: Extract and loop specific song sections for practice or performance.
- Students: Save key segments of lectures or tutorials for easy review.
- Anyone: Create and share your own clips for personal use or to share with friends.

Download Video Clipper today and maximize your YouTube experience!
